original_text:
Because you have raged against me
    and your complacency has come to my ears,
I will put my hook in your nose
    and my bit in your mouth,
and I will turn you back on the way
    by which you came.’
korean_text: 네가 나를 거슬러 분노함과 네 오만함이 내 귀에 들렸으므로 내가 갈고리로 네 코를 꿰며 재갈을 네 입에 물려 너를 오던 길로 돌아가게 하리라 하셨나이다

sentences.original_text: Because you have raged against me
and your complacency has come to my ears,
sentences.korean_translation: 네 오만한 소리가 내 귀에 들렸고

sentences.original_text: I will put my hook in your nose
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 내 갈고리를 네 코에 꿰뚫고

sentences.original_text: and my bit in your mouth,
and I will turn you back
on the way by which you came.’
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 왔던 그 길로 되돌아가게 하리라
